title: Slovakian walnut bread
ingredients: ['450g walnuts, ground in a food processor', '200g caster sugar', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '225g apricot jam', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '200g caster sugar', '450g margarine', '6 eggs', '475ml soured cream', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '250ml milk', '1.25kg plain flour', '2 (7g) sachets dried active baking yeast', '50g unsalted butter, melted', '1 egg yolk, beaten']
